title: 13. Augustus and Agrippa
description: The political partnership between Augustus and Agrippa and Agrippa’s role in the creation and maintenance of the Principate.

questions.question: Why was Agrippa crucial to Augustus’ rise and maintenance of power?
options: He provided vital military command and leadership

questions.question: What role did Agrippa play at the Battle of Actium?
Which office did Agrippa hold that involved extensive public works?
What improvements to Rome is Agrippa particularly associated with?
Why was Agrippa granted proconsular imperium?
options: To command legions independently of Augustus
To give him authority over imperial provinces

questions.question: What additional power was granted to Agrippa alongside proconsular imperium?
Why did these powers make Agrippa nearly Augustus’ equal on paper?
options: They gave him control of the Senate
They allowed him to command Rome directly
They mirrored Augustus’ own constitutional powers

questions.question: Why was Agrippa viewed as a potential successor or regent?
options: He married into the imperial family
He was trusted to safeguard Gaius and Lucius Caesar

questions.question: What marriage strengthened Agrippa’s political position?
What evidence shows Agrippa’s importance to Augustus after his death?
options: He was buried with military honours only
His ashes were placed in Augustus’ mausoleum

questions.question: How was Agrippa represented alongside Augustus on coinage?
Why might Augustus have recalled Agrippa from provincial command?
options: To strengthen his position in Rome

questions.question: Which provinces did Agrippa govern during his career?
options: Transalpine Gaul and the Eastern Provinces

questions.question: What does the Laudatio Agrippae suggest about Augustus’ view of Agrippa?
